title: Find LCD
text: The least common denominator of $$\frac{a}{a+12}$$ and $$\frac{4}{7}$$ is $$7\left(a+12\right)$$.

title: Multiply LCD Both Sides
text: Through multiplying both sides by LCD, we get $$7a=4\left(a+12\right)$$.

title: Isolate a on One side
text: We can further simplify $$7a=4\left(a+12\right)$$ to $$7a=4a+48$$. By subtracting 4a both sides, we get $$3a=48$$. Then we divide by 3 both sides of the equation and get $$a=16$$ as the final answer.
